Description: Small, narrow rectangular bag, undyed cotton, with decorative sewing in light blue cotton. Seeds the size and shape of melon seeds found within it in a soil matrix. Bag made from a single piece of cloth folded down one side and seamed across the opposite side and across one end. various repairs in undyed cotton thread.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), B48 room 193a floor 2
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
